word:
"WHEN BROTHER AND SISTER WHITE CAME TO MONTEREY, 
                                                                           601
SEPTEMBER 7, THEY REQUESTED ME TO ACCOMPANY THEM TO BATTLE CREEK. I HESITATED ABOUT GOING, THINKING THAT IT MIGHT BE DUTY TO STILL FOLLOW UP THE INTEREST IN MONTEREY AND THINKING, AS I EXPRESSED TO THEM, THAT THERE WAS BUT LITTLE OPPOSITION TO THEM IN BATTLE CREEK. AFTER PRAYING OVER THE MATTER SEVERAL DAYS, I RETIRED ONE EVENING ANXIOUSLY SOLICITING THE LORD FOR LIGHT IN THE MATTER.
